    xQTLvisual_genesExp

    xQTLvisual_genesExp.Rd

    density plot of specified genes' expression profiles in a specified tissue.

    xQTLvisual_genesExp(
  genes,
  geneType = "auto",
  tissueSiteDetail = "",
  datasetId = "gtex_v8"
)

    Arguments

    genes

    Following gene types are supported:

    • Gene symbol.

      A character string or a character vector (case ignored). like: "tp53","naDK","SDF4".

    • Gencode/ensemble id (versioned or unversioned).

    geneType

    A character string. "auto","geneSymbol" or "gencodeId". Default: "auto".

    tissueSiteDetail

    A character string. Tissue detail can be listed using "tissueSiteDetailGTExv8" or "tissueSiteDetailGTExv7"

    datasetId

    A character string. "gtex_v8" or "gtex_v7". Default: "gtex_v8".

    Value

    A ggplot object

    Examples

    genes <- c("FNDC8", "S100Z", "AQP6", "AMOT", "C3orf38", "FOXL1", "COX11",
           "FCN3", "DDX58", "CFI", "MS4A18", "NUDT13", "HOXA4", "VSX1")
xQTLvisual_genesExp(genes, tissueSiteDetail="Lung")

genes <- c("ENSG00000073598.5","ENSG00000171643.13","ENSG00000086159.12","ENSG00000126016.15",
           "ENSG00000179021.9","ENSG00000176678.5","ENSG00000166260.10","ENSG00000142748.12",
           "ENSG00000107201.9","ENSG00000205403.12","ENSG00000214782.7","ENSG00000166321.13",
           "ENSG00000197576.13","ENSG00000100987.14")
xQTLvisual_genesExp(genes, geneType="gencodeId", tissueSiteDetail="Liver")
